The provide coffee (tip the cups hold 8 oz). Plenty of room to spread out and kids can play inside and outside. They have a high chair for littles who need one. Awesome response time from the hosts all weekend and leading up to the weekend. Minimal check out clean up.
Negatives: there were carpenter ants in the lower den and third bedroom(more lower den than bedroom); the third bedroom is not close to a bathroom; primary bedroom didn’t have a door for the primary bath (was completely open). 2 bedroom doors are not solid-they are vented doors so there’s no noise blocking for littles to fall asleep. Floors look clean, but bring socks for everyone so feet don’t turn black.

some minor inconveniences would be that there was an iron but no ironing board, the motion lighting in the closet kept turning off, some sort of welcome package with things to do or local emergency numbers would have been a great touch, and the remotes to various fans and lights could have been labeled with what they go to.
